## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator near position (x=0.0, y=12.0)
This structure generates electricity using steam power.
Consists of the following entities:
-   Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
-   Pipe network connecting the pump to boilers (PipeGroup starting at x=-8.5 y=-0.5)
-   Boiler at position (x=0.0
